dcterms:description: The SSv2 dataset contains videos that are strongly correlated with actions, making action relationship modeling particularly important for few-shot action recognition.
dcterms:title: SSv2 (Something-Something V2)

dcterms:creator: Joao Carreira
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: The Kinetics dataset is widely used for action recognition tasks and consists of a large number of video clips categorized into various action classes.
dcterms:title: Kinetics
